name: Brook
text: Activate: Main You may rest this character and one leader or stage card with the "Dressrosa" type: KO up to one of your opponent's characters with cost 1 or below. Then, trash two cards from the top of your deck.

effect.text: You may rest this character and one leader or stage card with the "Dressrosa" type: KO up to one of your opponent's characters with cost 1 or below. Then, trash two cards from the top of your deck.
